section.title: Test Cases
section.para: Test Cases are a level up from Test Steps in the test hierarchy. They are the building blocks or keywords from which other Test Cases and Test Suites are made. They are the reusable elements of your tests.
A Test Case can contain any number of Test Steps and other Test Cases nested to any depth. Test Cases are given user-defined names.
Test Cases can be reused â€“ in other Test Cases and in Test Suites. There are no limits on how often a Test Case can be reused, as long as no circular dependencies (infinite loops) are created.
